blogs.author: Guest

blogs.title: About this Project
blogs.body:
Developed a responsive blog website using React.js and JSON as the database.
Implemented key features including adding new blogs with title, author, and body sections, as well as the ability to delete blogs.

Technologies Used:

React.js
JSON
HTML
CSS
blogs.author: ravindra
